overview: After Paul Canon sucks his boyfriend, Finn Harding's cock at a New Year's Eve party, he doesn't want to spill a drop on either of their immaculate suits, so he spits the load into a glass of bubbly, much to the chagrin of cute caterer, Felix Fox, who swallows it up to make sure it doesn't go to waste! When Felix splits his pants, gentlemanly Finn helps him hide it by standing behind him, but soon gives in to temptation, fingering the blond twink's hole and fucking him doggystyle! When Paul catches his man rimming the caterer in another room, he pops a bottle to turn this party into a fuckfest.  The morning after his epic NYE party, Pax Perry is awoken by the cleaning service he hired, and he lets in Joey Mills and his coworker with his cock still hanging out. Joey is intrigued by the sexy blond client's hot body, and when he finds a sex machine while cleaning up, he has to strip down and try it out.
title: New Years Sleaze
